column5: I'm looking for a good source of fresh mussels, preferably in Scarborough. Any suggestions? Are Metro/Superstore/Fresh Co. etc decent sources...? Thanks guys!
Diana's Seafood - huge supplier/retailer near Warden/Lawrence.
Seacore in woodbridge. A new place, actually they have been supplying fish market for years? Toppins they just opend up in Woodbridge. I do them three times a year and I get them from Fortinos.
You can scrape all you want off my dock ?
Need to find some friends that head doen east regularly.  Just got a cooler full of fresh quahogs and scallops
Thanks for the suggestions guys, I'll give Diana's a call tomorrow.  ec: I lived in Halifax for 2 years, the seafood process here are outrageous...
Was going to say, Dianas has the best selection you can find, we send customers there when they're looking for fresh fish, and we're in Oshawa
That's 2 votes for Diana's, I guess I know where I'm heading tomorrow afternoon. Thanks guys!

Thanks for the suggestions guys, I'll give Diana's a call tomorrow.  ec: I lived in Halifax for 2 years, the seafood process here are outrageous... yeah may have to dartmouth shortly to drive a buds car back you know my coleman 177 can cooler coming on that journey esp since he owns oceanfront property. on a more serious note, when it comes to fresh seafood loblaws gets 3 deliverys a week from the east coast i had the service contract for the delivery vans for a company called starlight seafood that were the middle men and they supplied several well known seafood stores as well, when craving mussels i never had a issue getting product from loblaws, thanks now craving some garlic steamed
Definitely Dianas!! They are a distributor to many stores and restaurants. The parent company is one of the biggest in Canada. The owners are old friends of mine. You cannot go wrong there.
If you like east coast oysters, this is the best time of year for them.
Diana's it is! Thanks guys!  ec: enjoy the N.S. and the drive back, watch the moose though
Diana's it is! Thanks guys!  ec: enjoy the N.S. and the drive back, watch the moose though aaah---surf and turf!!
East coaster oysters all day long!  Dianas pushes a lot of product and their stuff is always fresh.  I'm gonna head down tomorrow, this thread has given me a serious craving - thanks OP
In Barrie, I frequent Johnnys seafood. DA BEST.  Looks like I will be adding 2 more stops to my bye weekend drop downs ketchenany. Still have the address.
